four senior leadership roles but if we
look at who's running the company just

let's look at Silicon Valley where women

recent survey of the world's tech
powerhouse asked women to reveal their
workplace woes and well it wasn't pretty
[Music]
60 percent had faced unwanted sexual
advances 65 percent felt left out from
social events because they were a woman
and 84% had been told they were too
aggressive it sounds like in many cases
women aren't just hitting a glass
ceiling they might also be climbing a
broken ladder ultimately women end up
quitting tech jobs at more than double
the rate of men so why is a more
balanced boardroom so important well
research suggests that companies led by
mixed gender teams actually deliver
better results
the bottom line is that diversity isn't
just about ticking boxes frankly it's

they're not working for me they're
